title: Peeps to play with
body:
Good day guys,

Just looking for peeps to play with, just chill and friendly. I main Jungle or Support (Idm the other roles). I main J4, Diana and Trundle for Jungle and Braum for Support. Currently unranked but looking forward to starting ranked next season.If you guys want to add me, Park Chanyeol is my user (or Tundradragon if that doesn't work). Thanks guys :D

Here is my Discord ID: Tundradragon#6401

P.S, if you get the k-pop reference, you're awesome :D

replies.body:
I'm a fan of 80's J-Pop, not modern K-Pop, and I only play ARAM.

If this floats your boat, add me.
